caption.p: Screening parameters. The average values determined for 96 GFP-positive wells (μ pos), negative wells (μ neg), and the corresponding standard deviations (δ pos and δ neg) are shown. These values were used to calculate the reproducibility (Z), percent coefficient of variation (%CV), signal-to-background (S/B) ratio, and signal-to-noise (S/N) ratio with the formulas shown.
